turkish_example_sentence: Biz o eski tarihi binaya sahip olmamışsak, onu restore edemezdik.
english_example_sentence: If we had not owned that old historical building, we could not have restored it.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы мы не владели тем старым историческим зданием, мы не смогли бы его восстановить.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Biz o eski tarihi binaya ______, onu restore edemezdik.
